translations: n.给出肯定回答者；肯定回答；赞成票（yes 的复数）

sentences.sentence: According to the latest opinion polls, the noes have 50 percent, the yeses 35 percent.
sentences.translation: 根据最新的民意测验，投反对票的人占50%，投赞成票的人占35%。

sentences.sentence: Every one of our "yeses" and nos "has a cost."
sentences.translation: 我们每一次说“是”和“不是”都要付出一定的代价。

sentences.sentence: There were more noes than yeses to the proposal.
sentences.translation: 对于这个提议，否决票比赞成票要多。
